API Documentation

Explore and test the Integration Hub API

OpenAPI Spec

Authentication

Required for authenticated endpoints

Endpoints

Quick Start

Get started with the Integration Hub API

Base URL

https://api.gicm.dev

Authentication

Include your API key in the X-API-Key header:

X-API-Key: your-api-key-here

Example Request

curl -X GET "https://api.gicm.dev/api/pipelines" \
  -H "X-API-Key: your-api-key-here"

API Reference

All available endpoints

GET
/api/pipelinesList pipelines

Retrieve a list of all pipelines

Query Parameters
pagestring
limitstring
statusstring
cURL
curl -X GET "https://api.gicm.dev/api/pipelines"
POST
/api/pipelinesCreate pipeline

Create a new pipeline

Request Body
{
  "name": "string",
  "description": "string",
  "steps": "array"
}
cURL
curl -X POST "https://api.gicm.dev/api/pipelines" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{}'
GET
/api/pipelines/{id}Get pipeline

Retrieve a pipeline by ID

cURL
curl -X GET "https://api.gicm.dev/api/pipelines/{id}"
PUT
/api/pipelines/{id}Update pipeline

Update an existing pipeline

cURL
curl -X PUT "https://api.gicm.dev/api/pipelines/{id}" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{}'
DELETE
/api/pipelines/{id}Delete pipeline

Delete a pipeline

cURL
curl -X DELETE "https://api.gicm.dev/api/pipelines/{id}"

requests/min
